tool_description: This API is used to verify Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) number against Vahan vehicle database.
name: RC Verification
title: RC Verification

api_list.name: RC Verification Basic (async)
api_list.description:
This API is used to verify Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) number against Vahan vehicle database. The API allows you to -

Fetch vehicle details registered against an RC number
Find the name of the vehicle’s owner
Check class of vehicle
Verify registration date of the vehicle
The API also provides the option to match the name of vehicle owner that has been captured in a use-case against the name of vehicle owner on the database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rc-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_rc_basic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rc-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
